definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: There Vulcan Peak Temple, built by the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 峰上有祝融殿，是明代所建。

sentences.english: Zhu Rong is the God of Fire in ancient Chinese mythology.
sentences.chinese: 祝融在中国古代神话中是火神。

sentences.english: According to some legends, Zhu Rong was an official in charge of fire under the Yellow Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 根据某些传说，祝融是黄帝手下主管火焰的人。

definition: Dijun, Shang dynasty protector God, possibly same as legendary Emperor 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
Chi You, legendary creator of metalworking and weapons/comet
Xingtian, headless giant hero of Chinese mythology decapitated by the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
Flame Emperors (c. 2000 BC), legendary dynasty descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
